NK040(thi)037:1: // gcod kyi chad tho btang ba ni /
NK040(thi)037:2: gtor ma la sman raka sbran te /
NK040(thi)037:4: sngon tshe bskal pa dang po 'das dus su //
NK040(thi)037:5: gzhi med rtsa ba bral ba'i gnas mchog tu //
NK040(thi)037:6: ngo bo ngos bzung bral ba'i slob dpon gyis //
NK040(thi)037:7: gzung yul rig dang bral ba'i slob ma la //
NK040(thi)037:8: rnam rtog mtshan ma bral ba'i dbang bskur tshe //
NK040(thi)037:9: sngar ma 'das pa'i rtogs pa kun 'dus nas //
NK040(thi)037:10: chos sku ye sangs rgyas par ma chad dam //
NK040(thi)037:11: tshogs drug 'gyu ba'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)037:12: chos sku zang thal grub pa'i phrin las mdzod //
NK040(thi)037:13: da lta bar gyi rtog pa bar ma la //
NK040(thi)037:14: snang ba ma 'gags gsal ba'i gnas mchog tu //
NK040(thi)037:15: ci shar zhing khams rgyas pa'i slob dpon gyis //
NK040(thi)037:16: blo rtog spros pa chod pa'i slob ma la //
NK040(thi)037:17: rig pa mngon sum bstan pa'i dbang bskur tshe //
NK040(thi)037:18: de la gnas pa'i dran rtog kun 'dus nas //
NK040(thi)037:19: longs sku nyams snang 'phel ba'i phrin las mdzod //
NK040(thi)037:20: gdod nas ma 'ong rtog pa'itha ma la //
NK040(thi)037:21: ci shar rjes med yal ba'i gnas mchog tu //
NK040(thi)037:22: 'khor 'das thig le rdzogs pa'i slob dpon gyis //
NK040(thi)037:23: bzang ngan blo dang bral ba'i slob ma la //
NK040(thi)037:24: rdzogs rim ming dang bral ba'i dbang bskur tshe //
NK040(thi)037:25: ma 'ong slad kyi dran pa kun 'dus nas //
NK040(thi)037:26: 'bras bu sku gsum thob par ma chad dam //
NK040(thi)037:27: ka dag dmigs gtad bral ba'i gtor ma bzhes //
NK040(thi)037:28: 'bras bu chos zad blo 'das grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)037:29: phata phata phatah ces gtor skyems gtsang sar mchod /
NK040(thi)037:30: 'di'i byung khung ming gsal yang cho ga spyi'i 'grigs
NK040(thi)037:31: ltar nye bar mkho ba'i phyir mkhan sa man+ta'i gcod
NK040(thi)037:32: pod nang gi phyag bris ji lta ba zhal bshus
